titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-1074, by Mr. Newhouse.
The resolution provides for consideration of the Conference Report to accompany H.R. 2. The resolution provides for one hour of debate and one motion to recommit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 196.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1176.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 191 (Roll no. 431).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 203 (Roll no. 432).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through FY2023. Prohibits provisions of the War Powers Resolution concerning congressional priority procedures from applying during the remainder of the 115th Congress to a concurrent resolution introduced with respect to Yemen.
